description:
Realizing that Claire is in love with Thane, Rae tries to direct events she recognizes from the game toward getting Thane and Claire together, despite her own feelings for Claire.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Love Is a Series of Ups and Downs
मेरा प्यार अप्स और डाउन्स की एक कड़ी है।
